meanings.definition: A small sample or piece of fabric used for testing or display.
meanings.sent1: I picked up a swatch of fabric to see if it matched the curtains.
meanings.sent2: The designer showed me a swatch of the new collection.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the swatch of fabric was a toy and started playing with it.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was like a colorful swatch of fabric in a sea of black and white.
meanings.sent5: The swatch of fabric felt soft and smooth to the touch.

meanings.definition: A small piece or portion of something.
meanings.sent1: He only took a small swatch of cake from the plate.
meanings.sent2: The hiker found a swatch of moss growing on the rock.
meanings.sent3: The child pretended the swatch of paper was a treasure map.
meanings.sent4: The sun painted the sky with a swatch of pink and orange hues.
meanings.sent5: She cut a swatch of ribbon to tie around the gift box.
